tool_description: Experience the future of speech technology with our Realistic Text to Speech service! Transform written content into lifelike audio with unparalleled accuracy and naturalness. Our advanced AI-driven system ensures flawless pronunciation, intonation, and emotion, making every word come alive. Whether for e-learning, audiobooks, customer support, or accessibility needs, our Realistic Text to Speech service delivers a seamless and engaging audio experience like never before. Embrace the power of...
name: Realistic Text to Speech
title: Realistic Text to Speech

api_list.name: Generate Text-to-Speech
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realistic-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com/v3/generate_voice_over_v2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realistic-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://realistic-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com/v3/generate_voice_over_v2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realistic-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
